title: viAct.ai
description: viAct is Asia’s top Sustainability-focused AI company that provides “Scenario-based Vision Intelligence” solutions for risk prone workplaces including construction, oil & gas, manufacturing, facility management, mining industry to build smart cities & nations. Since its inception in 2016, viAct has developed & deployed 50+ pre-built AI modules in Government, Public & Private Sectors by transforming vision to practical actions for better workplace safety through ai enabled ehs software.
